status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description:
1. Launch KS.
2. Go to Phone -->Contacts -->Contacts Picker.
3. Click on show picker button.

h5.Actual Result:
1. No contacts picker come up.

h5.Expected Result:
1. We should get a contacts picker.
fields.summary: BlackBerry: KitchenSink: Phone > Contacts > Contacts Picker; When tapped on show picker button no picker is shown
